channel.title: Comments on: Fan Service

item.title: By: jerseysr25
item.dc:creator: jerseysr25
item.description: Great company to get juice from. They answer questions via email very quickly and provided thorough answers to my questions. Very quick shipping too. And lastly the flavor was great and very unique.
item.content:encoded: Great company to get juice from. They answer questions via email very quickly and provided thorough answers to my questions. Very quick shipping too. And lastly the flavor was great and very unique.

item.title: By: Juan Lebron
item.dc:creator: Juan Lebron
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/shop/fan-service/#comment-1563">Mark Tello</a>.
It's pretty good n has a smooth berry taste..
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Mark Tello.

It’s pretty good n has a smooth berry taste..

item.title: By: monika.ganeva.mg
item.dc:creator: monika.ganeva.mg
item.description: Fresh berry flavor with a minty aftertaste. I just want to add that their shipping was super fast even though I placed an order for 10 different flavors and I was very impressed with their customer service when I needed some help. I love the ability to choose your own VG/PG content, nicotine level and even more so, creating your own flavors.
item.content:encoded: Fresh berry flavor with a minty aftertaste. I just want to add that their shipping was super fast even though I placed an order for 10 different flavors and I was very impressed with their customer service when I needed some help. I love the ability to choose your own VG/PG content, nicotine level and even more so, creating your own flavors.

item.title: By: Mark Tello
item.dc:creator: Mark Tello
item.description: Definitely has the berry flavors in it but a weird after taste.
item.content:encoded: Definitely has the berry flavors in it but a weird after taste.
